info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 7:57AM CDT until April 23 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS St Louis MO
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...
Maries River near Westphalia.
Moreau River near Jefferson City.
River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Moreau River near Jefferson City.
* WHEN...From this evening to Wednesday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Near this height, Walnut Acres Road near North Moreau Creek will likely need to be closed. This road is 18.3 river miles upstream of the gage.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 24.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/lsx

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
